item.title: Delta command help
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

So I want to make a command so you get money when you have 27 logs in your inventory it removes the logs and then adds cash.
Heres the code

if (command.startsWith("logcash")) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1511, 27)==true) { deleteItem(1515, 27); addItem(995, 2700); sM("You traded the logs for coins!"); } if (command.startsWith("magiccash")) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1513, 27)==true) { deleteItem(1513, 27); addItem(995, 60000); sM("You traded the logs for coins!"); } if (command.startsWith("yewcash")) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1515, 27)==true) { deleteItem(1515, 27); addItem(995, 27000); sM("You traded the logs for coins!"); } if (command.startsWith("maplecash")) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1517, 27)==true) { deleteItem(1517, 27); addItem(995, 16000); sM("You traded the logs for coins!"); } if (command.startsWith("willowcash")) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1519, 27)==true) { deleteItem(1519, 27); addItem(995, 11000); sM("You traded the logs for coins!"); } if (command.startsWith("oakcash")) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1521, 27)==true) { deleteItem(1521, 27); addItem(995, 5000); sM("You traded the logs for coins!"); }
Why would this not work?

Read full topic
